content:
elliottt edited issue #7257:

For logging purposes, we'd like to have unique request ids prefixed on each log line in the wasmtime serve command. This would include stdout/stderr from the incoming handler, to make it easier to debug behavior on individual requests.

elliottt closed issue #7257:

For logging purposes, we'd like to have unique request ids prefixed on each log line in the wasmtime serve command. This would include stdout/stderr from the incoming handler, to make it easier to debug behavior on individual requests.
